articles.title: Microsoft, Apple and Meta outperform as investors seek safety from SVB chaos in megacap tech stocks
articles.content: Investors are seeking succor from the market chaos unleashed by the collapse of Silicon Valley Bank in shares of some of the most established technology names to emerge from the U.S. startup ecosystem.

articles.title: Dow down 400 points in final hour of trade after Credit Suisse woes reignite bank-sector angst
articles.content: U.S. stocks are lower in the final hour of trade Wednesday, but off the session's worst levels, after concerns over the health of Credit Suisse sparked renewed banking-sector anxiety.

articles.title: Meta exceeds $500 billion valuation for first time in 9 months
articles.content: Meta's new job cuts are resonating with investors, helping give the company a closing valuation above $500 billion for the first time since June.
